name: Phoenix Force
entries: Gas 7. Gas weapons do not require to be loaded, rather attached to them is a tank of fuel. A gas weapon uses one unit of gas per attack, and can attack until the tank is depleted. A Gas tank can be refilled by spending 1 minute per unit refilled. You cannot store additional units of Gas, except within the weapon itself.
Cone 10. Cone weapons attack in a cone with a length equal to their value, using the attack roll rolled on all creatures within its cone area.
